name: WorkExcuse
0:
”Alexa, ask work excuse to give me a work excuse”
”say a work alibi”
”tell me a work cover”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: work excuse
des: This is a funny application that announces the typical excuses people use at work. Some excuses are funny and some are usual excuse to serve as ideas for those needing an excuse.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
